channel.title: The day 1 to night 1 bug is back
channel.description:
#### What happened? You know how back in the day you couldn't open your journal during day 1 or it would freeze and not go to night 1? That just happened to me last game except I opened my deathnote during day 1. I was assassin and getting excited about it too. My name that game was Blue Lizard if that helps you guys find the game.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It should have gone from day 1 to night 1
#### Steps to reproduce: Nothing yet but I'll open up my deathnote next game I am able to during day 1 and try to replicate it.
#### Comments: My screen name is CN73DRUMMER

item.title: The day 1 to night 1 bug is back
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
It’s cool I had to leave the game. Report me!

Nah but I’m in a pally game now and tried to replicate it and it went to N1 just fine. Isolated incident I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: The day 1 to night 1 bug is back

item.title: The day 1 to night 1 bug is back

item.description:
/Vote CN73DRUMMER

You just outed yourself as assassin! >:D

item.title: The day 1 to night 1 bug is back

item.description:
What happened?

You know how back in the day you couldn’t open your journal during day 1 or it would freeze and not go to night 1? That just happened to me last game except I opened my deathnote during day 1. I was assassin and getting excited about it too. My name that game was Blue Lizard if that helps you guys find the game.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It should have gone from day 1 to night 1

Steps to reproduce:
